mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NAME, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, DOCU_NO, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{docuNo}, #{fileOriginName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileUpoadDate} )

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NAME, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{fileOriginName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, sysdate )
